review_title: It was decent college job experience.
pros: I got to access to copier room and supply closet and got to work with different instructors. I was able to access to office 24/7.
cons: It pays very low even for work study it should be at least 8.25. Another thing is the hours it is limited to 10. I think at least 20 hours would be helpful.

job_title: Resident Director in New London, NH
pros: The people who work there (most of them) are great and really value their work with students (and one another).
cons: The pay was terrible for the amount of things I was asked to do and the amount of work expected. Salary in residence life is not great across the board, but this was especially dismal.

pros: Flexible schedule, opportunity to be social with campus/community members!
cons: Minimum wage, sometimes not enough work to keep busy. But that means you can do homework!
